mapper.select: select tpir.`promotion_include_rule_id`, tpir.`promotion_id` , case tpir.`vendor_id` when -1 then 'All boutiques' else v.`vendor_name` end as vendor_name,tpir.`season_code` ,tpir.`brands` ,tpir.`categorys` from `t_promotion` tp inner join `t_promotion_exclude_rule` tpir on(tp.`promotion_id` = tpir.`promotion_id` and tp.`enabled` = 1) left join `vendor` v on(v.`vendor_id` = tpir.`vendor_id` and v.`enabled` = 1) where tp.`banner_id` = #{bannerId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
